nodes.text: Karova Canal was located in Lonisa City, on the planet Valo. The riverway was capable of holding multiple pleasure rafts and security cruisers, and had a high-end hotel whose windows faced down toward it. In 231 BBY,[source?] the canal offered a quick route by speeder to the then nearly finished Jedi temple located on the planet.
Karova Canal was appeared in The High Republic: Race to Crashpoint Tower, a novel by Daniel José Older, which was released on June 29, 2021.
